summary: During the Klondike Gold Rush, a traveler purchases a dog to lead the way toward the treasure, but reconsiders his journey when he finds a jilted married woman.
cast: Clark Gable|Loretta Young|Jack Oakie|Reginald Owen|Frank Conroy|Katherine DeMille|Sidney Toler|James Burke|Charles Stevens|Lalo Encinas|Thomas E. Jackson|Russ Powell|Herman Bing|George MacQuarrie|Buck|C.E. Anderson|Edwin Argus|William Arnold|Arthur Aylesworth|Leon Beaumon|Hank Bell|Wade Boteler|Tyler Brooke|Frank Campeau|Helene Chadwick|Wong Chung|Jesse De Vorska|Kay Deslys|Pat Flaherty|Sam Godfrey|Sid Grauman|Duke Green|Jack Grey|Arthur Housman|John Ince|Perry Ivins|Kay Johnson|Harriet King|Peggy Langton|Theodore Lorch|Loo Loy|Mary MacLaren|Cecile Marcel|Mia Marvin|LeRoy Mason|Walter McGrail|Larry McGrath|Carol Mercer|Frank Mills|Hazel Mills|Frank Moran|John T. Murray|Bud Osborne|Bob Perry|Loretta Rush|Syd Saylor|Gay Seabrook|Philip Sleeman|Jack Stoney|Pearl Varvalle|Marie Wells|Frank Whitson|Joan Woodbury|Harry Woods
director: Director: William A. Wellman (as William Wellman)
title: La llamada de la selva
